tacztweaks.bullet_interactions.error:

tacztweaks.bullet_particles.error:

tacztweaks.bullet_sounds.error:
There was an error while loading bullet sounds.
Check the logs for more detail.
Allows bullets to damage correct body parts when using the FirstAid mod.
tacztweaks.config.compat.lsoCompat.descr: Allows bullets to damage correct body parts when using the Legendary Survival Overhaul mod.
tacztweaks.config.compat.lsoCompat.name: LSO Compat
tacztweaks.config.compat.mtsFix.descript: Fixes bullet collision on vehicle entities from the Immersive Vehicles mod.
tacztweaks.config.compat.mtsFix.name: Immersive Vehicles Fix
tacztweaks.config.compat.vsCollisionComp: Allows bullets to properly collide with Valkyrien Skies ships.
tacztweaks.config.compat.vsExplosionComp: Allows explosive bullets to damage and knockback Valkyrien Skies ships.
tacztweaks.config.crawl.dynamicPitchLimi: Changes the pitch limit dynamically based on block collisions.
tacztweaks.config.crawl.enabled.descript:
Enables or disables the TaCZ' crawling feature completely.
Allows other crawl mods to function properly with TaCZ.
tacztweaks.config.crawl.enabled.name: Enabled
Changes the lower pitch limit while crawling.
Changes the upper pitch limit while crawling.
tacztweaks.config.crawl.visualTweak.desc: Tweaks the crawling animation to look more natural.
tacztweaks.config.crawl.visualTweak.name: Visual Tweak
tacztweaks.config.debug.bulletInteractio: Enables the debug log for bullet interactions.
Enables the debug log for bullet particles.
tacztweaks.config.debug.bulletSounds.des: Enables the debug log for bullet sounds.
tacztweaks.config.debug.meleeInteraction: Enables the debug log for melee interactions.
tacztweaks.config.gun.allowUnload.descri: Enables or disables the gun unload feature.
tacztweaks.config.gun.allowUnload.name: Allow Unload
tacztweaks.config.gun.cancelInspection.d: Allows you to cancel the gun inspection animation by pressing the inspect key again within 3 seconds, instead of replaying the animation from the start.
tacztweaks.config.gun.disableBulletCulli:
Improves the accuracy of bullet rendering at close range.
Potentially impacts performance in intense scenarios, such as large-scale multiplayer gunfights.
tacztweaks.config.gun.reloadDiscardsMaga: Makes the reloading discarding the remaining ammo, instead of returning them back to the inventory.
tacztweaks.config.gun.reloadWhileShootin: Allows reloading guns immediately after shooting.
tacztweaks.config.modifier.addend.name: Addend
tacztweaks.config.modifier.function.desc:
Modifies the value by executing this Lua function.

Available variables:
`x`: A value after addend and multiplier are applied.
`r`: Base value before addend and multiplier are applied.
`y`: The output value.

Example: `if (x > 20) then y = r + 5 else y = x * 3 end`
tacztweaks.config.modifier.function.name: Function
tacztweaks.config.modifiers.aimInaccurac: Modifies the inaccuracy of guns while aiming.
Modifies the armor piercing rate of guns.
tacztweaks.config.modifiers.damage.descr: Modifies the base damage of guns.
tacztweaks.config.modifiers.damage.name: Damage Modifiers
tacztweaks.config.modifiers.friction.des: Modifies the friction (air drag) of guns.
tacztweaks.config.modifiers.gravity.desc: Modifies the gravity (bullet drop) of guns.
tacztweaks.config.modifiers.gravity.name: Gravity Modifiers
tacztweaks.config.modifiers.headshot.des: Modifies the headshot multiplier of guns.
tacztweaks.config.modifiers.horizontalRe: Modifies the horizontal recoil of guns.
tacztweaks.config.modifiers.playerDamage: Modifies the damage of guns against players.
tacztweaks.config.modifiers.playerHeadsh: Modifies the headshot multiplier of guns against players.
tacztweaks.config.modifiers.rpm.descript:
Modifies the RPM of guns.
Maximum RPM is limited to 1200 by the game tick rate.
tacztweaks.config.modifiers.rpm.name: RPM Modifiers
tacztweaks.config.modifiers.speed.descri: Modifies the bullet speed of guns.
tacztweaks.config.modifiers.speed.name: Speed Modifiers
tacztweaks.config.modifiers.verticalReco: Modifies the vertical recoil of guns.
tacztweaks.config.title: TaCZ Tweaks
tacztweaks.config.tweaks.alwaysFilterByH: Always enable filter by hand option in the gun smith table
tacztweaks.config.tweaks.betterMonoConve: Makes the stereo to mono sound converter in TaCZ better by mixing the two channels together, instead of discarding other channels.
tacztweaks.config.tweaks.endermenEvadeBu: Makes endermen teleport away from bullets, avoiding getting hit.
tacztweaks.config.tweaks.forceFirstPerso:
Uses the first person shooting sound instead of the third person one when other players shoot.

Note: The first person sounds are typically in stereo, meaning it won't preserve the directionality when played.
Enabling the `Stereo to Mono conversion` option will converts the sounds to mono and fixes this issue.
Hides the hit markers that display when you land a shot.
tacztweaks.config.tweaks.suppressFleshHi: Suppresses the sound that plays when you land a shot that is not a headshot.
tacztweaks.config.tweaks.suppressHeadHit: Suppresses the sound that plays when you land a headshot.
tacztweaks.config.tweaks.suppressKillSou: Suppresses the sound that plays when you kill an entity with a gun.
